h3cMplsOam.name: h3cMplsOam
h3cMplsOam.contactinfo: Platform Team Huawei 3Com Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China Http://www.huawei-3com.com Zip:100085
h3cMplsOam.description: This MIB contains objects to configure OAM module. The Operation, Administration and Maintenance (OAM) is an effective means for decreasing the cost of network maintenance. The MPLS OAM is used to administrate and maintain MPLS.

H3cMplsOAMDefectType.name: H3cMplsOAMDefectType
H3cMplsOAMDefectType.description: An indication of the OAM's defect type: 1: dServer, server layer defect; 2: dPeerMe, peer network maintenance entity defect; 3: dLOCV, Loss of Connectivity Verification defect; 4: dTTSIMismatch, Trail Termination Source Identifier Mismatch defect; 5: dTTSIMismerge, Trail Termination Source Identifier Mismerge defect; 6: dExcess, receiving excess rate of CV/FFD; 7: dUnknown, unknown defect in the MPLS network.. 8: rlsn down; 9: dLspDown; 10: MPLS OAM ME; 11: no defect.

H3cMplsOAMDetectFreq.name: H3cMplsOAMDetectFreq
H3cMplsOAMDetectFreq.description: An indication of the OAM's frequent type( ITU-T: Y.1711(0402) ): For CV: the frequency is static. The value is 1/s. For FFD: the frequency is set by user. The value can be 10ms, 20ms, 50ms, 100ms, 200ms, 500ms. Any other frequency is wrong. 1: 10ms; 2: 20ms; 3: 50ms; 4: 100ms; 5: 200ms; 6: 500ms; 7: 1000ms(only for cv).

h3cMplsOamCapability.name: h3cMplsOamCapability
h3cMplsOamCapability.description: Whether OAM is globally capable. false: incapable; true: capable; The default value is incapable.

h3cMplsOamTrapOpen.name: h3cMplsOamTrapOpen
h3cMplsOamTrapOpen.description: Whether OAM trap is globally enabled. false: disable; true: enable; The default value is disable.

h3cMplsOamIgrTable.name: h3cMplsOamIgrTable
h3cMplsOamIgrTable.description: This table specifies per-LSP MPLS OAM ingress capability and associated information, such as IgrLspName and IgrDetType.

h3cMplsOamIgrEntry.name: h3cMplsOamIgrEntry
h3cMplsOamIgrEntry.description: An entry in this table is created by an LSR for every LSP capable of supporting MPLS OAM at ingress.

h3cMplsOamIgrIndex.name: h3cMplsOamIgrIndex
h3cMplsOamIgrIndex.description: This is an unique index for an OAM ingress entry in the OAM table.

h3cMplsOamIgrLspName.name: h3cMplsOamIgrLspName
h3cMplsOamIgrLspName.description: The name of an LSP. It means the LSP name of the detected LSP.

h3cMplsOamIgrDetectType.name: h3cMplsOamIgrDetectType
h3cMplsOamIgrDetectType.description: There are two types of OAM packets, CV and FFD. The CV flow is generated at the source LSR of the LSP with a nominal frequency of 1/s and terminated at the sink LSR of the LSP. FFD provides failure detection option for an LSP independent of the CV based availability model and is not tied to the CV insertion rate. Insertion rates at 1/s or faster may also be used. The CV/FFD packet contains a network-unique identifier (TTSI) so that all types of defects can be detected. 1: CV; 2: FFD.

h3cMplsOamIgrDetectFreq.name: h3cMplsOamIgrDetectFreq
h3cMplsOamIgrDetectFreq.description: Indication of the OAM's frequent type.

h3cMplsOamIgrRevType.name: h3cMplsOamIgrRevType
h3cMplsOamIgrRevType.description: When an LSP is found to be in defect, the sink LSR of the LSP should send BDI to inform the source LSR of the LSP, the BDI is transferred through the reverse LSP. The type of reverse LSP can be private or shared. If private, then the reverse LSP can be used only by the oam ingress; If shared, the reverse LSP which is shared between many forward LSPs, whose source LSRs are the same and sink LSRs are the same. 1: private; 2: share.

h3cMplsOamIgrRevLspName.name: h3cMplsOamIgrRevLspName
h3cMplsOamIgrRevLspName.description: The object indicates the name of the reverse LSP.

h3cMplsOamIgrLspId.name: h3cMplsOamIgrLspId
h3cMplsOamIgrLspId.description: For ingress, the object indicates the lsp ID of the detected LSP.

h3cMplsOamIgrEnable.name: h3cMplsOamIgrEnable
h3cMplsOamIgrEnable.description: Whether one LSP is OAM enable. If disable, LSP is not monitored; If enable, CV/FFD is generated at the source LSR of the LSP and checked at the sink LSR of the LSP, and user can set other configuration. false: The OAM function is disabled on the ingress; true: The OAM function is enabled on the ingress.

h3cMplsOamIgrDefectType.name: h3cMplsOamIgrDefectType
h3cMplsOamIgrDefectType.description: Indication of the OAM's defect type.

h3cMplsOamIgrRowStatus.name: h3cMplsOamIgrRowStatus
h3cMplsOamIgrRowStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation, deletion and modification of rows, which support active status and CreatAndGo, destroy operation. To create a new row, h3cMplsOamIgrLspName, h3cMplsOamIgrDetectType, h3cMplsOamIgrDetectFreq, h3cMplsOamIgrRevType, h3cMplsOamIgrRevLspName, and h3cMplsOamIgrLspId must be specified.

h3cMplsOamEgrTable.name: h3cMplsOamEgrTable
h3cMplsOamEgrTable.description: This table specifies per-LSP MPLS OAM capability and associated information, such as DetectType, DetectFrequency.

h3cMplsOamEgrEntry.name: h3cMplsOamEgrEntry
h3cMplsOamEgrEntry.description: An entry in this table is created by an LSR for every LSP capable of supporting MPLS OAM at egress.

h3cMplsOamEgrIndex.name: h3cMplsOamEgrIndex
h3cMplsOamEgrIndex.description: This is a unique index for an OAM egress entry in the OAM table.

h3cMplsOamEgrLspName.name: h3cMplsOamEgrLspName
h3cMplsOamEgrLspName.description: The object indicates the name of static LSP at egress.

h3cMplsOamEgrDetectType.name: h3cMplsOamEgrDetectType
h3cMplsOamEgrDetectType.description: There are two types of OAM packets, CV and FFD. The CV flow is generated at the source LSR of the LSP with a nominal frequency of 1/s and terminated at the sink LSR of the LSP. FFD provides failure detection option for an LSP independent of the CV based availability model and is not tied to the CV insertion rate. Insertion rates at 1/s or faster may also be used. The CV/FFD packet contains a network-unique identifier (TTSI) so that all types of defects can be detected. 1: CV; 2: FFD.

h3cMplsOamEgrDetectFreq.name: h3cMplsOamEgrDetectFreq
h3cMplsOamEgrDetectFreq.description: Indication of the OAM's frequent type.

h3cMplsOamEgrRevType.name: h3cMplsOamEgrRevType
h3cMplsOamEgrRevType.description: When an LSP is found to be in defect, the sink LSR of the LSP should send BDI to inform the source LSR of the LSP, the BDI is transferred through the reverse LSP. The type of reverse LSP can be private or shared. If private, then the reverse LSP can be used only when the only LSP in defect; If shared, the reverse LSP, which is shared between many forward LSPs that have the same source LSRs and sink LSRs. 1: private; 2: share.

h3cMplsOamEgrRevLspName.name: h3cMplsOamEgrRevLspName
h3cMplsOamEgrRevLspName.description: The object indicates the name of a reverse static-lsp.

h3cMplsOamEgrLsrId.name: h3cMplsOamEgrLsrId
h3cMplsOamEgrLsrId.description: The object indicates the Ingress LSR ID of the LSP.

h3cMplsOamEgrLspId.name: h3cMplsOamEgrLspId
h3cMplsOamEgrLspId.description: The object indicates the the Ingress session lsp ID of the detected static-LSP.

h3cMplsOamEgrEnable.name: h3cMplsOamEgrEnable
h3cMplsOamEgrEnable.description: Whether one LSP is enabled with OAM. If disable, LSP is not monitored; If enable, CV/FFD is generated at the source LSR of the LSP and checked at the sink LSR of the LSP, and user can set other configuration. false: The OAM function is disabled on the egress; true: The OAM function is enabled on the egress.

h3cMplsOamEgrDefectType.name: h3cMplsOamEgrDefectType
h3cMplsOamEgrDefectType.description: Indication of the OAM's defect type.

h3cMplsOamEgrRowStatus.name: h3cMplsOamEgrRowStatus
h3cMplsOamEgrRowStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation, deletion and modification of rows, which support active status and CreatAndGo, destroy operation. To create a new row, h3cMplsOamEgrLspName, h3cMplsOamEgrDetectType, h3cMplsOamEgrDetectFreq, h3cMplsOamEgrRevType, h3cMplsOamEgrRevLspName, h3cMplsOamEgrLsrId and h3cMplsOamEgrLspId must be specified.

h3cMplsOamIgrLSPOutDefect.name: h3cMplsOamIgrLSPOutDefect
h3cMplsOamIgrLSPOutDefect.description: This notification is generated when the LSP is found out of the defect state at the LSP ingress.

h3cMplsOamIgrLSPInDefect.name: h3cMplsOamIgrLSPInDefect
h3cMplsOamIgrLSPInDefect.description: This notification is generated when the LSP is found in the defect state at the LSP ingress.

h3cMplsOamEgrLSPOutDefect.name: h3cMplsOamEgrLSPOutDefect
h3cMplsOamEgrLSPOutDefect.description: This notification is generated when the LSP is found out of the defect state at the LSP egress.

h3cMplsOamEgrLSPInDefect.name: h3cMplsOamEgrLSPInDefect
h3cMplsOamEgrLSPInDefect.description: This notification is generated when the LSP is found in the defect state at the LSP egress.
